module.p:
caora air beinn a sheep on a mountain –
Bha na caoraich shuas air cliathach na beinne.
The sheep were up on the side of the mountain. td. 21

caora ann am monadh ... a sheep on a moor –
Chunnaic mi caoraich agus crodh anns a’ mhonadh.
I saw sheep and cattle on the moor. td. 21
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang agus stad Màiri mionaid no dhà a’ coimhead air na caoraich agus air na h-uain.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank and Mary stopped for a minute or two looking at the sheep and at the lambs. td. 76

caoraich agus crodh sheep and cattle –
Chunnaic mi caoraich agus crodh anns a’ mhonadh.
I saw sheep and cattle on the moor. td. 21

caora agus uan a sheep and a lamb –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang agus stad Màiri mionaid no dhà a’ coimhead air na caoraich agus air na h-uain.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank and Mary stopped for a minute or two looking at the sheep and at the lambs. td. 76

caora agus cìobair a sheep and a shepherd –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang agus stad Màiri mionaid no dhà a’ coimhead air na caoraich agus air na h-uain.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank and Mary stopped for a minute or two looking at the sheep and at the lambs. td. 76

caora ann am fang a sheep in a fank –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang agus stad Màiri mionaid no dhà a’ coimhead air na caoraich agus air na h-uain.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank and Mary stopped for a minute or two looking at the sheep and at the lambs. td. 76

faic ... caora ... sees a sheep –
Chunnaic mi caoraich agus crodh anns a’ mhonadh.
I saw sheep and cattle on the moor. td. 21
Am faca tu na caoraich? Chunnaic.
Did you see the sheep? Yes, I did. td. 177

coimhead ... air caora ... looks at a sheep –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang agus stad Màiri mionaid no dhà a’ coimhead air na caoraich agus air na h-uain.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank and Mary stopped for a minute or two looking at the sheep and at the lambs. td. 76
